thread.title: Australian winemakers drink up Chinese enthusiasm

title: Australian winemakers drink up Chinese enthusiasm
text:
Australian winemakers drink up Chinese enthusiasm 2:35am EST - 01:19 
Australian winemakers are cultivating connections in China, the world’s fastest-growing wine market, that are bearing valuable fruit even as entrenched European exporters are hitting headwinds. Rosanna Philpott reports.   
Australian winemakers are cultivating connections in China, the world’s fastest-growing wine market, that are bearing valuable fruit even as entrenched European exporters are hitting headwinds. Rosanna Philpott reports.  //reut.rs/2EJ2ejS
